tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Twitter) (, ,)) (VP (VBZ is) (S (NP (PRP it)) (ADJP (JJ wrong) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB feel) (PP (IN for) (NP (JJ special) (NNS friends))) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD can) (ADVP (RB never)) (VP (VB revive))))))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [is/VBZ nsubj>[Twitter/NNP punct>,/,] xcomp>[wrong/JJ nsubj>it/PRP xcomp>[feel/VB mark>to/TO nmod:for>[friends/NNS case>for/IN amod>special/JJ] ccomp>[revive/VB mark>that/IN nsubj>I/PRP aux>can/MD neg>never/RB]]] punct>./.]
